about_the_game:
Deadly Swag is a cooperative horror shooter that plunges you into the heart of the Zone. Navigate eerie forests, anomaly-ridden fields, and abandoned villages on the surface, while delving into dark underground bunkers, laboratories, and industrial ruins filled with deadly secrets.

Team up with fellow stalkers to survive in this unforgiving world. Explore the Zone, evade lethal anomalies, fight terrifying mutants, and uncover rare artifacts. Sell your findings to a mysterious trader to upgrade your gear and prepare for even more dangerous expeditions.

Features:

  • Co-op Survival: Join forces with friends to survive in a world where every mistake can be your last.

  • Two Worlds of the Zone: Explore perilous surface areas and dive into foreboding underground locations brimming with hidden dangers.

  • Tension-Filled Atmosphere: Every mission will keep you on edge—mutants, anomalies, and constant challenges ensure a relentless experience.

  • Artifact Collection and Trade: Venture into the Zone driven by greed and return with the hope of survival.

  • Tactics and Teamwork: Coordinate your actions to overcome the Zone's many threats.

Are you ready to face the horrors of the Zone? Explore, fight, survive, and prove you have what it takes to be a stalker. Welcome to Deadly Swag!

name: Deadly Swag

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz ; Shader Model 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A co-op horror shooter set in the Zone. Explore dangerous locations, collect artifacts, fight mutants, and avoid deadly anomalies. Survive together, sell your loot, and return for more challenges. In the Zone, every step is a fight for survival.
